class_notes: It is a continuation of Intermediate Persian I. We will continue developing the speaking and listening skills acquired in Persian 201 and reinforcing competence in casual as well as formal Persian. Readings, audio/ video materials and class activities will let students to deepen their understanding of linguistic and cultural contexts. In addition, students will be prepared to understand what they listen and to answer orally, as well as to extend speaking competence to include the mastery of the various situations in which the learners attend. It will enhance their listening comprehension and ability to have general topical discussions and extend significantly range of vocabulary.
course_description: Prerequisites: Persian 201 or permission of instructor. Continuation of Persian 201, with focus on reading and interpretations of a variety of literary and popular texts.
